Package game.Levels

Class GameLevel

java.lang.Object
city.cs.engine.World
game.Levels.GameLevel
public abstract class GameLevel
extends city.cs.engine.World
Abstract class with some bodies acting as a template for all the levels

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class city.cs.engine.World

    DEFAULT_GRAVITY, version

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void bump()
    Methods to play different sounds based on which objects have a collision
    abstract void checkForStart()
    Abstract class checking whether the character has started to move This is then used to activate a timer appropriately
    void clearFrame()
    Method to remove objects from the frame
    void darkChar()
    Methods to switch to dark theme character for levels 3 and 5
    void decreaseAmmo()
    Method run to decrease the ammo left when a Fireball is shot
    void decreaseHealth()
    Method to decrease health level after certain collisions and check if any character lives are left
    void endGame()
    Method for the state when game ends as the result of a collision removes collision listeners from characters to stop from any other collisions occuring Also plays the game over sound and stops background music Character movement is stopped Game checks for whether a new highscore has been reached Displays banner giving the option to restart the game
    int getAmmo()
    Getter for ammo variable used to check if ammo is left and Fireball object can be created in the levels
    Character getCharacter()
    Getter for character object
    int getCurrentLevel()
    Getter for the currentLevel variable for the files interface class to be able to reference when saving a game state
    Game getGame()
    Getter for Game variable to give access to methods in Game class
    int getScore()
    Getter for score using the characters x position, as scoring is essentially measured by the distance covered
    LvlEnd getSensor()
    Getter for sensor in order to be able to reposition it for every level
    SettingsButton getSettings()
    Getter for SettingsButton object for repositioning
    game.Levels.Banner getTitle()
    Getter for banner object
    float getWalkSpeed()
    Getter for walkspeed referencing method from Game class to give access to KeyListener which doesn't have Game class access
    void increaseHealth()
    Method to increase health level after certain collisions
    boolean isOver()
    Getter for boolean checking whether the game has ended
    void lifeGain()
    Playing tone if life has been gained
    void lifeLoss()
    Methods to play sound after health has decreased
    void lightChar()
    Method to switch look of character for levels using the light colour theme
    void muteMusic()
    Method to mute background music if mute state changes from settings
    void setAmmo​(int i)
    Setter for ammo for every level to set the amount of ammo available for the given level
    void setCurrentLevel​(int i)
    Setter for currentLevel, called when a new level is opened to update the current level of the game
    void setGroundColour​(int i)
    Method for changing the ground colour
    void setMusic​(java.lang.String s)
    Method to allow levels to set their background music Prevents from having to replicate bgMusic object in every single level

    Method to deploy ammo
